original_title: The American Adventures of Surelick Holmes
overview: Surelick Holmes and his trusted companion Watson are off to America to solve a case. It seems the board members of Mr. Rich Bitchâ€™s company are being murdered because he refuses to pay one million dollar ransom for them. Mr. Bitch has engaged Charles Head (Private Dick) to solve the case and in turn Charles has turned to his old class chum, Surelick.
title: The American Adventures of Surelick Holmes
